headline: Cathie Wood Is Buying DoorDash Stock After Identifying AI As Most 'Disruptive' Innovation In History: ARK Also Snaps Up AMD and Alphabet
summary: On Monday, Cathie Wood-led Ark Invest executed significant trades across its ETFs, focusing on companies like Figma Inc. (NYSE:FIG) , DoorDash Inc. (NASDAQ:DASH), and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD). The Wood-led company also transacted in the shares of BWX Technologies Inc. (NYSE:BWXT), Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOG) and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. Ltd. (NYSE:TSM) The Figma Trade Ark Invest made a substantial purchase of Figma shares, acquiring 380,126 shares through its ARK In

headline: DoorDash Refocuses Global Footprint With Market Exits And Hub Closure
summary: DoorDash is exiting Qatar, Singapore, Japan, and Uzbekistan across its Deliveroo and Wolt brands as part of an operational restructuring. The company is also closing Deliveroo's Bengaluru engineering hub and reallocating engineering talent. These changes reflect a focus on international markets where DoorDash reports seeing a clearer path to sustainable scale and long term leadership. For investors watching NasdaqGS:DASH, this shift comes as the stock trades at $173.06, with a 3 year return...
